nodes.text: Unidentified Coruscant Security officer  (Organa staffer's sister)

A female individual served as a police officer with the Coruscant Security Force during the Clone Wars between the Galactic Republic and the Confederacy of Independent Systems. After a terrorist attack on the planet Coruscant, she was part of an emergency checkpoint set up in the aftermath. There, she stopped the airspeeder containing Jedi Knight Obi-Wan Kenobi, who was wounded during the attack. Seeing the Jedi, the officer escorted the speeder back to the Jedi Temple so that Kenobi could receive emergency treatment. The officer later told her sister, a staffer for Senator Bail Prestor Organa, about the wounded Kenobi, and the sister in turn told Senator Organa.
The individual was first mentioned in The Clone Wars: Wild Space, which was written by Karen Miller and published on December 9, 2008.
